website_summaries.verdict: The Citiscape Metro on-ear headphones have a great sense of style for a budget-priced headphone, but the sound lacks clarity.
pros: The Philips Citiscape Metro on-ear headphones exhibit a sleek, Euro design with a warm balance of sound
cons: The headphones are missing smartphone-friendly features like a foldable headband, an inline mic, and volume controls

customer_reviews.title: These are great headphones. The sound quality is great
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. The sound quality is great, the comfort is great, just all around great head phones. Mind you I am not an audiophile so I would expect a different opinion from somebody that is. I use these in the office just about everyday and they are still working just the same after 3 years. The only reason why they get 4 stars instead of 5 is because after 3 years of use the fake leather on the ear cups is flaking off. It leaves little black bits on my shirt and skin. Even with that I would still buy these again and I have recommended them friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jamez Barton

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy These Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones as a gift for my daughter. The sound quality is excellent. However, the package the sound comes in is sub-par. After six months of moderate use, the headband broke. All plastic, not a bit of metal in the headband to reinforce it. Its a shame Philips chooses to put excellent sound in such cheap packaging.
customer_reviews.author: willyd1968

customer_reviews.title: best headphones I have owned in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This set offers an incredible bass response while still maintaining a crisp clear high end. They do a great job of muting external noise. And for once these headphones offer a chord that doesn't get tangled with itself or other chords, not to mention the fact that they are very comfortable to wear. This purchase was well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Roy B.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, light and comfortable. Minus is that they brake super easily, the plastic is very thin and fragile.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these headphones
customer_reviews.text: Durable Good Sound Rich Base Comfortable for long periods of time Those are really the main points I dig about these things.. They sound absolutely amazing.. They're comfortable.. AND I haven't managed to break them yet in all my travels. I'm actually considering the more expensive versions right now just to see if their as good or better.
customer_reviews.author: KB-S

customer_reviews.title: I got these for a great price due to an open-box purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a great price due to an open-box purchase. The headphones are very nice, both in form and function. Bass is solid, but not so much that it overpowers the mids and highs in music. Balance and fullness of sound makes listening to anything a better experience, from electronic music and hip-hop to classical music to TV shows and movies. I would highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good, after burn-in.
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to spend a lot on headphones, so I was using a pair of Monoprice 108323's which sounded great, but were uncomfortable. These Philips headphones are more comfortable and have good bass, electronic dance music sounded great out of the box. Rock music, however, sounded pretty bad- guitars sounded distorted and vocals were weak. I tried to "burn in" these cans with several hours of playing white noise and frequency sweeps and that did cause a noticeable improvement in the sound to the point that I am now happy with these cans.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: I love my headphones
customer_reviews.text: One thing about me, is that I listen to music majority of my day. This means I have to quality headphones. These headphones, although feel a little tight after about 3.5 hours, still have amazing base. IF YOU ARE THE TYPE OF PERSON WHO LOVES LISTENING TO HIP HOP OR RAP< THESE ARE THE BEST HEADPHONES!!!!!! also, depending on device you use, like a laptop, the sound is very load but clear
customer_reviews.author: kelsey

customer_reviews.title: No Microphone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Well built, looks great. There are two sections of this site that show that this headphone has a built in microphone, but that is not the case on teh 5200 model. You have to go with the 5105, 5605 or 5905 if you want a microphone.
customer_reviews.author: DaGudge

customer_reviews.title: nice.
customer_reviews.text: These are very bass-y, but it is well suited to the type of music I listen to. The brown peels off after a while, but they still look decent.
customer_reviews.author: lovely day outside

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I know they were not a lot of money but these are really poor quality. The sound is painful. I wanted them just for my iPad but they are even terrible with mp3's. Spend a little more money. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Outta Control

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They are very comfortable. It's hard to carry around in the bag but you can always put them around the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Of course it is cumbersome to carry on the go ...
customer_reviews.text: Of course it is cumbersome to carry on the go, but for a Philips product it has decent sound quality and the cushioning block out sound really well. A bit too well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Venning

customer_reviews.title: Philips SHL5200WT/28 CitiScape Metro Headphones (White)
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I feel that for the price, these are good headphones. The quality of the product is sound, but the head band isn't very sturdy. On the other hand the ball joint inside the earcups creates a very comfortable listening experience. The padding on the top is and will fray at the edge, due to the manufacturing process, but if you are looking for a solid and well designed pair of headphones for below $50 I would suggest these.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas. He loves them and thinks I spent a fortune on them. Really nicely padded and very comfortable. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya C

customer_reviews.title: nice for me
customer_reviews.text: This phone is decent price with elegant outlook. It fit perfectly for me, but I do not recommend this phone for man because it will hurt your ears, guys. I promise :)))!!!. My boy friend wear it one time and he never touch it again
customer_reviews.author: Ai ngo

customer_reviews.title: philips citiscape metro
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headphones and stylish......you can't beat these for the price!..i very good sound, noise cancelling and a tangle free cord.....i am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: coolvee

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: Better headphones out there looks good in pics but my v modas are the only ones I use now even gave my beats to my nephew .
customer_reviews.author: Gary c

customer_reviews.title: Best product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I searched and investigated at least 20 different kinds of headphones, from low end to high end. The quality of the low end bass sound is comprable to models that were five times the price of these. The head band is soft and easy to adjust. The cord is extended from an earbud length, making it a bit easier to use with a computer or mp3 device.
customer_reviews.author: Shari L. Neely

customer_reviews.title: love it. !
customer_reviews.text: about, perfect sound, perfect fit, is just a good headphones, u could get them without any problem was here on time and perfectly package too, i recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: Tight, poor sound
customer_reviews.text: They feel very tight and the sound quality was much less than I was expecting. After about half an hour my ears felt really uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: D. P.

customer_reviews.title: great headphones
customer_reviews.text: they sound great, and look even better. I would recommend these to anyone who doesn't want to spend 200-300 on a pair and would rather spend 60.
customer_reviews.author: Zonalou

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!!! I love these headphones.
customer_reviews.text: These headphone have the sound value of a $200 set of headphones. Very comfortable if you use them for less than a few hours. They do have quite a bit of sound leak but besides that i have no complaints. Absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: S.O.

customer_reviews.title: Bass heavy and muddy sounding
customer_reviews.text: Very bass heavy and the sound is muddy. Granted they are only $20 headphones, but I have cheaper earbuds that sound better.
customer_reviews.author: J. Burgett

customer_reviews.title: Hurt your ears
customer_reviews.text: After an hour these really hurt your ears, and the sound quality is not that good. However, I did get for $15 so I'm not going to judge it to harshly. Also it look decent, for headphones in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: cbejin

customer_reviews.title: According to my son...
customer_reviews.text: These are great headphones. He's had a couple of pairs and none were this comfortable and with good sound as well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Turner Sr

customer_reviews.title: Good, Not the Best.
customer_reviews.text: It's weird that I see a lot of people claiming they're "bass heavy", although it clearly states they are tuned for extra bass. Great sound, love the bass boost, but they slide off of my ears if I tilt my head forward or back.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bazaldua

customer_reviews.title: It's good.
customer_reviews.text: It looks okay but works fine. I just wish I got something more slicker and cool looking but it does it job well for headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Petit Bois

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for some great sounding headphones these are them !!! Bought a pair at tj max last year for $30 ! Awesome sound!! Bought 3 more on amazon for $21 free shipping on prime !
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Specifically went looking for these since my old pair was chewed up by a pet dog. So glad I was able to find a new pair, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Smoak

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it broke after i used it for only 3 weeks.......they should have chosen stronger plastic....
customer_reviews.author: Chen

customer_reviews.title: They sound good but fit loose your head
customer_reviews.text: they sound great but what I dont like is the memory foam cover on the ears, they sit just on top of the ears instead of around the ears. So, the feel very loose when wearing them. They are great if you plan on staying still during the time you wear them. If your planning on moving around alot, look at another pair that fit more snuggly on the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory W. Crowson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like them, but if i wear them for too long they hurt my ear
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: surprisingly comfortable despite pressing against your ears, good sound quality with emphasis on low tones (plus for me at least). The cord also doesn't tangle, which is good.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is of a passable quality, bordering on good. It's a little tight on the noggin, especially if you wear glasses. Note that my head is not large or anything. The looks : A little plasticky, but they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: bojan

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this rating because of the nice sound these headphones have. Nice bass and clear mids and highs. However , I would Like a bit more padding on top.
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo Morales

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: They sound great but the band is plastic with foam padding. I expected pleather. The chord is nice too. It does not tangle
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Grant

customer_reviews.title: These headphones seemed to be good quality, but they stopped working a couple months ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones seemed to be good quality, but they stopped working a couple months after purchase with light usage. JUNK.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent sound
customer_reviews.text: Not too bad sound and these are very comfortable headphones. They are soft and don't squish against your ears or get uncomfortable when wearing them for a while, like some headphones do.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Holthaus

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. Great quality and very comfortable. One of the best sets of headphones I've ever bought in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kohanski

customer_reviews.title: affordable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, and well made. Good bass. Comfortable. Can't compare with other $200 headphones but is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Avash Chitrakar

customer_reviews.title: kind of OK
customer_reviews.text: nothing out of the extraordinary. I got them for about 20 dollars and they are comfortable enough to use them walking around. the quality of the sound is not really good. there are better options for that amount of money if you are looking for quality. they look good and they are comfortable. that's all
customer_reviews.author: Martin Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing audio
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my picky preteen daughter. She has used them every day and loves them. We compared the sound quality to the very popular and expensive Beats, and were impressed with the full, clear sound these headphones produced. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: barbara fuller

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't wear for more than 10 mins OUCH!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly couldn't keep them on my head long enough to get an idea about sound quality because even though they look comfortable with all that cushion, they're not! I've never had headphones hurt my ears like these did. I read a similar review and purchased them anyway thinking that person was just being a baby but I regret wasting my money now.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Phillips

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time and works good. A A A A A A A A A A A A A A
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: they loved it and said it worked fine
customer_reviews.text: I got as a gift, they loved it and said it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jakes

product_meta.title: Philips SHL5200BK/28 CitiScape Metro Headphones (Black) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe pop-culture inspired Metro headphone flawlessly combines pure comfort and iconic style with its soft, breathable headband and auto-fitting ear cushions, topped with a high gloss finish.

AMAZON.COM



The Philips CitiScape Metro on-ear headphones combine comfort and iconic style with premium sound quality to deliver an immersive sound experience. These sleek headphones feature a breathable headband and soft, 360-degree rotating foam ear cushions for long-lasting comfort. For durability, the headphones use a flat, anti-tangle cable that will stay kink and knot free.







CITISCAPE METRO ON-EAR HEADPHONES, BLACK (SHL5200BK/28)
AT A GLANCE:

 * Dynamic 40-millimeter drivers deliver premium sound quality
 * Soft, noise-isolating foam ear cushions prevent sound leakage
 * Breathable headband and 360-degree rotating ear cushions for comfort
 * Constructed from lightweight plastic with high-gloss finish
 * One-year limited warranty





Metro headphones feature a flat anti-tangle cable. View larger. 






Influenced by different people from major global cities, the Philips CitiScape Collection is inspired by city life and urban culture. Taking cues from the past and the future - where classic meets cutting edge - and inspired by urban street apparel, each headphone is truly distinctive. The Metro is designed for full sound immersion, with soft, isolating cushions for greater comfort. Wherever you go with your music, you will experience a truly immersive sound experience that shields you from the city's noise, but not its buzz.

My City. My Space. My Music.





Stylish 40-millimeter drivers deliver premium sound quality. View larger. 



Noise-isolating foam ear cushions are soft for extra comfort and prevent sound leakage. View larger. 

POWERFUL SOUND IN A SLEEK PACKAGE
The Metro integrates premium performance with eye-catching solid colors and a high-gloss finish. Powerful dynamic 40-millimeter drivers deliver crisp highs, solid mids, and deep, rich bass without distortion. A closed-back design ensures good bass response and keeps you absorbed in the music. 

COMFORTABLE MEMORY FOAM EAR CUSHIONS ISOLATE SOUND
The Metro's soft foam ear cushions mold to your ear for pure comfort. They block out external noise as well as preventing sound leakage so you can focus on the music without sharing it with the world. 

BREATHABLE HEADBAND AND ROTATING EAR CUSHIONS
The Metro offers a soft, perforated headband that will still be comfortable after hours of wear. Ear cushions that rotate 360 degrees provide a better fit as well as making storage easier. 

ANTI-TANGLE CABLE FOR YEARS OF USE
The Metro is constructed with lightweight, high-gloss plastic and a flat, anti-tangle cable that won't knot, improving both your listening experience and the headphones' durability. 

PRODUCT AND WARRANTY INFORMATION
The Metro headphones have a 1.2-meter (3.93-foot) cable. They carry a one-year limited warranty. 

ABOUT PHILIPS
Philips has a brand promise of "sense and simplicity" that encapsulates their commitment to understanding and catering to the desires and needs of consumers and customers. By putting end users front and center, Philips creates innovative products that are designed around people's needs and aspirations, and are both advanced and easy to use. With 60,000 registered patents, Philips is a global leader in innovation, and receives numerous international design awards every year. 

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
Philips CitiScape Metro on-ear headphones, black (SHL5200BK/28).
feature_bullets: Bass sounds feel deeper and richer with dynamically tuned 40mm drivers
Be part of the city's buzz but not its noise with on ear isolating cushions
Enjoy long listening comfort with the soft foam cushions
1.2m flat anti-tangle cable prevents knots and kinks for hassle-free storage
